title: Best of The Program | Guests: Amb. David Friedman & Rev. Bill Bean | 8/14/20
description:
President Trump has proved yet again that his Middle East strategy is incredibly effective. U.S. Ambassador to Israel David Friedman joins to discuss why the United Arab Emirates’ normalization of relations with Israel is truly historic and how a Biden administration could reverse Trump’s progress. Glenn’s latest podcast with NFL legend Herschel Walker is truly inspiring and covers way more than football. Does anyone even care that the government is confirming UFOs are real and scouting out our nuclear sites? World-renowned exorcist and “spiritual deliverance minister” Rev. Bill Bean believes that “The Exorcist” is accurate.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
